content.raw:
First of all, I apologize for not marking this PR as a `[WIP]`, but I have a few significant changes coming down the line soon for this.

It turns out that `find_dependency(~)` doesn't support cmake components until `cmake-3.9`, so we won't be able to use `find_dependency(~)` at all in our `*-config.cmake` files if we want to be able to specify package components to depend on. In some upcoming changes (which are currently testing well on my machine), we'll be replacing all `find_dependency(~)` calls with `find_package(~)` and dealing with the `REQUIRED` and `QUIET` flags in our own way.
